forecast.day_comments: Snow showers before 5am, then snow after 5am. Some thunder is also possible.  Steady temperature around 24. Light southwest wind.  Chance of precipitation is 80%. Total nighttime snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible.
forecast.night_comments: Snow, mainly before 2pm.  High near 26. Wind chill values as low as 6. Northwest wind 6 to 11 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 80%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible.
